summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 17, Renton Addition, being the alley between 17th Avenue and 18th Avenue, from East Union Street to East Spring Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12132 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
